content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.Define devolution.Explain why some governments devolve power.Explain how devolution may affect policy making.Explain how devolution may weaken legitimacy.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.Define devolution.Explain why some governments devolve power.Explain how devolution may affect policy making.Explain how devolution may weaken legitimacy.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
